articles.description: “Daily reminder to all of us to not forget how beautiful you are inside and out," the 'Twilight' actor wrote to Gomez on Instagram.
articles.content:
Taylor Lautner is coming to Selena Gomez‘s defense as she continues to face people body-shaming her on social media.

articles.title: Michelle Trachtenberg, ‘Buffy the Vampire Slayer’ and ‘Harriet the Spy’ star, dies at 39 - The Associated Press
articles.description: Michelle Trachtenberg, the actor known for “Gossip Girl,” “Buffy the Vampire Slayer” and “Harriet the Spy” died Wednesday. She was 39. New York City police say they responded to a call at a residential high-rise building in Manhattan found Trachtenberg unresp…
